snippet: Inequality in the U.S. education system favors white children over minorities, the poor and the disabled, making it "one of the most urgent civil rights issues of our time," former President George W. Bush said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Education Gap Is an 'Urgent' Civil Rights Issue: George W. Bush
headline.main: Education Gap Is an 'Urgent' Civil Rights Issue: George W. Bush

lead_paragraph: Inequality in the U.S. education system favors white children over minorities, the poor and the disabled, making it "one of the most urgent civil rights issues of our time," former President George W. Bush said on Thursday.
